segments.text: The kitchen setup shows a typical indoor scene with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a sink on the right with water running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is full and overflowing onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands facing the sink area, holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's using a dish towel to dry the plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is positioned on a step stool near the left cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His arm is extended into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close by, with her hand raised toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink reveals a garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears placed steadily in front of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall drawing captures an everyday household moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
